publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4956.3 Margaret Smith: Role of Colleges in the Economic Recovery—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4956) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to review the current system of discretionary childcare funding, to work closely with the Scottish Further and Higher Education Funding Council to develop articulation routes between further and higher education, helping to address problems that students face during transition and enhancing and developing links between the sectors, and, in recognising the valuable role of Scotland’s colleges in skills development, to bring the revised skills strategy before the Parliament to allow detailed debate of its recommendations."
